name: Diagon Alley
description: A cobblestoned shopping area for the wizarding world, where Hogwarts students can purchase necessary supplies
whereInTheWorld: Just off Charing Cross Road, London, behind a pub called the Leaky Cauldron
magicalProperties: A busy shopping street completely unseen by Muggles and accessible by tapping a special brick in the wall of The Leaky Cauldron three times
significantEventsThatTookPlaceHere: Harry's reintroduction to the wizarding world when he arrives with Hagrid to buy his Hogwarts supplies
peculiarThingsThatLiveHere: Rumour has it that dragons guard the Gringotts vaults below the ground
